pages.text: $(li)You can consume Fish Oil to make you float while you are contact with water for a minute, that includes rain too.$(br)$(li)This item can be used to craft $(l)Copper Lanterns$() in a $(l:patchouli:utility/vanilla/crafting_table)Crafting Table$(/l) too.
$(li)You can give Fish Oil to a $(l:patchouli:pets/alexsmobs/bald_eagle)Bald Eagle$(/l) to tame it.
